header.title: wxSplashScreen

description.p: wxSplashScreen shows a window with a thin border, displaying a bitmap describing your application.
Show it in application initialisation, and then either explicitly destroy it or let it time-out.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxFrame wxTopLevelWindow wxWindow wxEvtHandler

func.fsummary: Construct the splash screen passing a bitmap, a style, a timeout, a window id, optional position and size, and a window style.
